    • Field Detail

      • RADIUS

        public static final double RADIUS
        The initial radius size (in meters) for the circle that represents a stop on the map.
        See Also:
        Constant Field Values

      • iconOptions

        public com.google.android.gms.maps.model.CircleOptions iconOptions
        The options that correspond to the stop icon (which is a circle). This is primarily used for the position, as well as determining and setting the current radius.

    • Constructor Detail

      • Stop

        public Stop(java.lang.String stopID,
            double latitude,
            double longitude,
            Route route)
        Creates a stop object.
        Parameters:
        stopID - The ID of the stop. This is usually the stop name.
        latitude - The latitude of the stop.
        longitude - The longitude of the stop.
        route - The route this stop corresponds to.

      • Stop

        public Stop(org.json.JSONObject json,
            Route route)
     throws org.json.JSONException
        Loads the stop from the provided JSON.

        This simply parses the JSON to the constructor.

        Parameters:
        json - The JSON to be parsed for the stop.
        route - The route this stop belongs to. This will also be passed to the constructor.
        Throws:
        org.json.JSONException - Thrown if there is an exception in parsing the JSON (ie missing a queried field).

    • Method Detail

      • addStop

        public static void addStop(com.google.android.gms.maps.GoogleMap map,
                           Route[] routes,
                           SharedStop[] sharedStops)
        Adds a stop to the map based on the routes. This will not add the stop to the map if it is a shared stop. Because of this check, this should be called after the sharedStops have been found and created.
        Parameters:
        map - The map to add the stops to.
        routes - The routes to add the stops to.
        sharedStops - The array of shared stops to check if the stops have already been added.

      • removeStops

        public static void removeStops(Route[] routes)
        Clears all the stops in the provided routes.
        Parameters:
        routes - The routes to have the stops cleared from.

      • getIcon

        public com.google.android.gms.maps.model.Circle getIcon()
        Gets the icon corresponding to the stop. This is really just a circle that may or may not be colored as well. This may be null if the icon has never been set via setIcon().
        Returns:
        The stop icon (a Circle object).

      • setIcon

        public void setIcon(com.google.android.gms.maps.model.Circle icon)
        Sets the icon, as well as providing the tag, and makes sure that the icon is clickable.
        Parameters:
        icon - The icon created in the map activity (usually done by map.addCircle()).
